DOC.brief_summary: This project develop contraceptive counseling protocol ( CCP ) ground scientific evidence evaluate CCP promote behavior conducive preventing unintended pregnancy among woman . The project develop refines CCP use focus group in-depth interview ( ) key administrator national office Planned Parenthood ( b ) key administrator participate Title X clinic , ( c ) contraceptive counselor , ( ) client health center . The CCP use scientifically grounded principle guide effective decision make provider-client communication . Ten Title X clinic randomly assign one two condition ( 5 clinic per condition ) : ( 1 ) treatment usual ( TAU ) ( 2 ) implementation CCP . Approximately 150 woman select study participation clinic , yield 1,400 participant ( half control half CCP ) . Immediately follow counsel session , woman complete computer-administered interview serf fidelity check permit evaluation effect CCP variable associate counsel satisfaction . All woman re-interviewed phone 6 month later 12 month later . The effect CCP method-choice effectiveness , method switching , gaps protection , use accuracy evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Must seek contraception clinic day recruitment Not seek contraception clinic day recruitment
